Text: oh look Greg 'bland' Land. what a peice of shit artist. was thinking of jumping on iron man but thanks to land i wont even steal this book.
based on this comic he seems to be pretty decent. why don't you like him, azex?

@wawsxxwa All of his faces and poses look exactly the same. its like he photoshops photos of real people and just uses a filter to make them look drawn. Look at any of his uncanny x-men, ultimate line, or phoenix endsong/warsong work. its all the same. its all bland. I want something unique and special like Bachelo or Ramos

man i agree totally that land isn't a top talent. and it's well documented that he cribs off photographs, which is pathetic.

but to play a little devil's advocate, gillen and land have gotten out 6 issues in 14 weeks ... and icv2 says the first 4 each sold 50k+ ...

honestly if greg land's producing 7-8 pages per week, i think this job's probably his for as long as he wants. marvel wants product (new trades) out there in time for the next movie in may.
as long as it isn't rob liefeld then i really don't care who the artist is.
